snippet.title: Battle Tabs — Multiplayer Turn-based Battle in Browser New Tabs
snippet.description:
Free Download: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/battle-tabs/mjcklhnhfiepmofggcoegkmkokbljmjd

Play the classic battle ships in your browser in the new tab. Queue up multiple matches and play a few seconds at a time in-between your browsing sessions!

⛵️Features:
- Super Bite-sized Gameplay, Perfect for the Few Seconds You Have to Take a Break in-between Tasks
- Intense Multiplayer Action
- Turn-based Classic Gameplay
- Queue Up Multiple Matches
- Vikings!
- and a Kraken

How to Play Battle Tabs: http://bit.ly/play-battletabs

🛶Questions? Feedback? Latest News? Find us on:
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/BattleTabs
- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BattleTabsGame/
